forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 55. Northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8pm, then rain showers likely and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 48. North wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a high near 55. North northwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. Northwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
